data.title: AK Svoboda, Chlumská, Chrůma
data.meta_description: Our team - AK Chlumská, Chrůma, Hrušková
data.text:
JUDr. Karla Makovcová Chlumská – karla.chlumska@scc.cz

Born in Prague. After graduating from the Faculty of Law of Charles University and a brief engagement with the Divadlo Hudby (Music Theatre), gathered a 3 year experience as a lawyer for the Czech branch of a an international advertising agency. Later she commenced her work as an independent commercial lawyer and has been working as an attorney since 1996. She speaks English and Russian, publishes in professional marketing press and conducts seminars in the field of advertising law. Registered mediator since 2013.

JUDr. Michal Chrůma, Ph.D. – michal.chruma@scc.cz

Born in Prague in 1973. He graduated from the Faculty of Law of Charles University in Prague in 1996. In 1996-2000 he completed postgraduate studies at the Faculty of Law of Charles University in Prague. Once completing his studies, he worked as a legal clerk at several law firms in Prague. He has been a partner of the law firm since 1998. He speaks English and Russian. Hovoří anglicky a rusky.

Mgr. Petra Hrušková, roz. Němečková – petra.hruskova@scc.cz

Born in Prague in 1975. She gained experience at various law firms from 1996. After graduating from the Faculty of Law of Charles University in Prague, she received experience as a legal clerk and has been working as an independent lawyer since 2002. Apart from commercial law, she deals with civil law, including marital law and the property issues in cooperation with real estate agencies. She appears in the media (ČT, TV Nova, Radio Frekvence 1).
